Description: Steatite bowl with relief decoration of a musical procession towards an image of Hathor.
Curator's comments: cf. Manniche, Music and Musicians in Ancient Egypt: 60, pl.9 Vleeming, Studia Demotica 5, No. 25, p. 11.
Published in 'BMQ' 29/1-2 (1964/65), pp.19-21' ref to in 'JEA' 63 (1977), p.189 and Anderson: 'Catalogue of musical instruments in the British Museum', p.8.
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 2017-2018, 13 Sep-15 Jan, Lens, Louvre, Musiques et sons antiques
